contentrichtext.text: <!-- This article was auto-generated by [[User:Polbot]]. --> {{taxobox |status = LC |status_system = IUCN3.1 |regnum = [[Plantae]] |unranked_divisio = [[Angiosperms]] |unranked_classis = [[Eudicots]] |unranked_ordo = [[Asterids]] |ordo = [[Lamiales]] |familia = [[Orobanchaceae]] |genus = ''[[Xylocalyx]]'' |species = '''''X. asper''''' |binomial = ''Xylocalyx asper'' |binomial_authority = [[Isaac Bayley Balfour|Balf.f.]] |}} '''''Xylocalyx asper''''' is a species of [[plant]] in the [[Orobanchaceae]] family. It is [[Endemism|endemic]] to [[Yemen]]. ==References== * Miller, A. 2004. [http://www.iucnredlist.org/search/details.php/45036/all ''Xylocalyx asper'']. [http://www.iucnredlist.org 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. ] Downloaded on 24 August 2007. [[Category:Flora of Yemen]] [[Category:Xylocalyx]] [[Category:Least concern plants]] {{Scrophulariaceae-stub}}
